publicationStmt.publisher: Yoav Cohen and Maya Ben Tov, Ben-Gurion University

lg.l: Up inside the halls of my mind
I'm inhaling all this darkness through me
Look at me, there's nothing to see
Do you really know who to be?
Let me hear it wasn't in vain You're here
Look, that space is right behind me
Hear those sounds, they're all around me
You can smell all sorts offlowers growing
Part of me is waiting to see
Willl really look out there for me?
Don't move before I know who I am Don't leave
Look, that space is right behind me
Hear those sounds, they're all around me
Smell those flowers growing in me
